overview:
Soam P. Lall is an internet executive with business development, sales, marketing and product experience. In his career Soam has worked with a number of industry recognized companies that have made noteworthy exits. An experienced leader, he’s created and executed winning strategies that help early stage companies scale rapidly.

While at Savings.com, he was responsible for creating a scalable self-service platform for partners to increase revenues and SEO links back to Savings. Contributed to the double digit growth of syndication revenues and created strategies to monetize the ecosystem of bloggers to create new revenue streams.

During his tenure at Linkshare, which was acquired by Japanese E-Commerece giant Rakuten for $425M, he was responsible for the acquisition of top Internet E-Commerce Retailers to the platform and overall adoption of LinkShare’s products and services.

Prior to early stage startups Soam had spent a number of years as an associate at alternative investment management fund Asset Alliance in New York City. He graduated from Boston University with a B.A. in Economics and minor in Business Administration from the Boston University School of Management.

relationships.title: VP Business Development, Head of RTD | Sensa Products, LLC
